title: Cross-sectional analysis of gut microbiome diversity with progression of Alzheimer's disease.
abstract: The relationship between gut microbiome diversity and stages of Alzheimer's disease (AD) progression is of interest. Hence, a total of 124 participants, including cognitively normal controls and patients with mild, moderate, and severe AD, were assessed for microbiome composition using 16S rRNA sequencing.
